hero.title: Questions Generator
hero.description: Enter a passage of text, and let our generator create a list of interactive and insightful questions for you to use. Perfect for quizzes, exams, or just expanding knowledge!

dnd.default: Drag and drop your file here or click to browse

questions.title: Generated Questions
questions.description: Here are the questions generated from your input:

list.name: Jack
list.body: This app is revolutionary! It has completely transformed the way I work. Highly recommend it!

list.name: Jill
list.body: I’ve never used anything so intuitive and powerful. This app is a game-changer for productivity.

list.name: John
list.body: The features are incredible, and the interface is so user-friendly. I can’t imagine going back to anything else.

list.name: Jane
list.body: This app is exactly what I’ve been looking for. It’s efficient, beautiful, and so easy to use.

list.name: Jenny
list.body: I’m blown away by how much this app has helped me. It’s well-designed and incredibly effective.

list.name: James
list.body: Simply outstanding! This app combines everything I need into one seamless experience.
